name: The Vigilante Proclivities of The Longspur
name_original: The Vigilante Proclivities of The Longspur
description:
In the not too distant future, artificial life is in its infancy and humankind has taken its first steps in a new evolutionary frontier, there are people that can fly, change shape, all that cool stuff!

Marlowe Reed is a rich industralist who struggles to find his place among the superpowered elite, without any powers, as the armoured vigilante Longspur, while humanity is struggling to improve so as not to be supplanted by its creations.

Instructions
  • Click ground to walk, and objects/characters to interact
  • Press Space Bar to highlight the objects you can interact with on the screen
  • Left click to skip text
  • Move your mouse to the top of screen to open your inventory
  • Equip items by clicking them
  • Use an equipped item by clicking it on an object or character.
